sourcesContent:
import { StyleSheet } from "react-native"
export const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        backgroundColor: '#F9F9F9', 
        flex: 1
    },
    top: {
        position: 'fixed', 
        zIndex: 1, 
        width: '100%', 
        height: 150, 
        backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF', 
        display: 'flex', 
        flexDirection: 'column', 
        justifyContent: 'space-evenly'
    },
    titleTop: {
        fontSize: 34, 
        fontFamily: 'Raleway-Bold', 
        left: 20
    },

    searchBar: {
        backgroundColor: '#FFF',
        width: "90%",
        paddingHorizontal: 10,
        marginTop: 10,
        borderRadius: 4,
        shadowColor: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)",
        shadowOffset: {
        width: 0,
        height: 1
        },
        shadowRadius: 8,
        elevation: 8,
        shadowOpacity: 1,
    },

    imagem: {
        width: 148, 
        height: 184, 
        borderRadius: 8, 
        shadowColor: "rgba(211, 38, 38, 0.25)", 
        shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 4 }, 
        shadowRadius: 8, 
        elevation: 8, 
        shadowOpacity: 1,
    },
    title: {
        fontSize: 40,
        fontWeight: 600,
        color: '#141414'
    },
    input: {
        backgroundColor: '#FFF',
        height: 64,
        width: "90%",
        paddingHorizontal: 10,
        marginTop: 10,
        borderRadius: 4,
        shadowColor: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)",
        shadowOffset: {
            width: 0,
            height: 1
        },
        shadowRadius: 8,
        elevation: 8,
        shadowOpacity: 1,
    },
    textoButton: {
        fontSize: 14,
        color: '#FFF',
        fontWeight: '500',
    },
    texto: {
        marginTop: 10,
        color: '#141414',
        fontSize: 12,
    },
    textoLink: {
        color: '#2B35AF',
    },
    botao: {
        backgroundColor: "#db3030",
        width: "90%",
        paddingHorizontal: 10,
        height: "38px",
        borderRadius: 25,
        shadowColor: "rgba(211, 38, 38, 0.25)",
        shadowOffset: {
            width: 0,
            height: 4
        },
        shadowRadius: 8,
        elevation: 8,
        shadowOpacity: 1,
        display: "flex",
        justifyContent: "center",
        alignItems: "center",
        marginTop: "20px",
    },
    botaoEstoque: {
        backgroundColor: "#db3022",
        width: "90%",
        paddingHorizontal: 10,
        height: "48px",
        borderRadius: 25,
        shadowColor: "rgba(211, 38, 38, 0.25)",
        shadowOffset: {
            width: 0,
            height: 4
        },
        shadowRadius: 8,
        elevation: 8,
        shadowOpacity: 1,
        display: "flex",
        justifyContent: "center",
        alignItems: "center",
        marginTop: "150px",
    },
})
